turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Bhuriwale.
turn.1: Where is the guru of the Bhuriwale located?
turn.2: The first Handwritten manuscript is placed and maintained by the present head of Garid Das's "Bhuriwale" sect, Mahant Dayasagar (Meharban Sahib).
turn.4: Lal Das Ji was the then appointed as successor of Brahm Sagar Ji Bhuriwale.
turn.6: Brahm Sagar Ji Bhuriwale called Lal Das Ji his "Lal" (son).
turn.8: After Lal Das Ji's Joti Jot (demise), Brahma Nand Ji Bhuriwale (formerly known as "Gauanwale") was appointed the next Guru.
turn.10: He too, along with his preaching, gifted the followers by opening schools and many degree colleges under the banner of his Gurus, especially for the girls in the rural areas like district Hoshiarpur district, Shaheed Bhagat Singh Nagar district, Ludhiana district, Ropar district.
turn.11: Is the guru a member of any organizations?
turn.12: He worked for the betterment of "Cows, Girls and Poor", he opened many Gaushalas and colleges.
